summary: Real estate strategy and finance professional with experience in feasibility analyses, underwriting, market analysis, and deal execution across residential and hotel development, leveraging advanced Excel modeling and cross-functional collaboration.

experience.title: Summer Analyst
experience.description: Performed feasibility analyses for potential residential and hotel development projects; evaluated terms of equity and debt partnership proposals; assisted in restructuring partnerships for a $300M Times Sq. hotel project; analyzed debt financing components (EB-5 vs mezzanine).

experience.title: Capital Services Intern
experience.description: Worked with the Director of Capital Services on origination, underwriting and execution for acquisitions and refinancings; restructured a $33M cross-collateralized loan secured by a 7-building portfolio; performed market analyses and created offering memorandums for lenders.

experience.title: Strategy Analyst
experience.description: Performed market analysis on the single-family second home market in Chennai; developed deal-by-deal analyses with development cost matrices and sales price sensitivity, concluding with IRR and ROE figures; assisted in executing a strategy shift toward single-family beach villas in the East Coast Road submarket.

experience.title: Consultant
experience.description: Founded boutique real estate advisory and brokerage; conducted feasibility studies and due diligence for developers; collaborated with CEO of Australian company on establishing a new factory; appointed as primary real estate consultant for Korean Trade Center and sold residential properties worth over $22M.

experience.title: Asset Manager
experience.description: Core real estate portfolio of $70M; determined pricing and strategy; produced quarterly operations reports; negotiated management contracts and renewed a high-profile lease with the German Consulate.

education.degree: M.S. Real Estate, Finance and Investments
education.school: New York University, Stern School of Business
IMG Nick Bollettieri Tennis Academy / Pendleton School
